de.wwu.muggl.symbolic.flow.defUseChains
Class DUGenerationBranch

java.lang.Object
  de.wwu.muggl.symbolic.flow.defUseChains.DUGenerationBranch

 class DUGenerationBranch
extends java.lang.Object

A DUGenerationBranch is a class used when finding def-use chains in methods. Its visibility is not public and it can only be used within this package.

When finding def-use chains, branching is needed at those instruction that may lead to a jump in the control flow (such as conditional jumps, switching instructions etc.). To check both parts, this class is used. It is initialized with the definitions yet found, the variables loaded since the last usage and the current pc. With these information all possibly branches can be visited since former states can be restored.

Version:
1.0.0, 2010-08-27
Author:
Tim Majchrzak

getSafeCopy

public DUGenerationBranch getSafeCopy()
Get a safe copy of this generation branch. This makes sure that any mutable data-structured are copied and changes to the copied branch will not affect this one.

Returns:
The copied branch.
